name: Vent Plumes
description: Columns of hot water and minerals from underwater vents create unique environments and potential sources of valuable materials. The extreme conditions create unique research opportunities, while the heat and toxic chemicals create constant danger.
atmosphere: Mineral-rich plumes rise like underwater geysers with constant rushing sounds. The warm water carries the scent of minerals and toxic chemicals. Hot water columns create underwater chimneys of life. Toxic chemicals create a deadly atmosphere for the unprepared. Extreme conditions create unique research opportunities. Your body feels the constant pressure and heat from the vent plumes.
